articles.content: The Los Angeles Angels (55-51) and the Atlanta Braves (67-36) open a 3-game interleague series Monday at Truist Park. First pitch is scheduled for 7:20 p.m. ET (ESPN+). Let’s analyze BetMGM Sportsboo… [+4370 chars]
